title: Among Shadows
description: Tristan is itching for a better life. When he's offered an opportunity to train as a Royal Officer, he quickly becomes the top recruit in his class. Unfortunately, the job turns out to be nothing more than glorified babysitting of powerful color alchemists. Tristan isn't sure he wants in, not when magic is involved! Everything changes the day he meets a young alchemist with an ability that could destroy herself and others. One split-second choice launches the pair onto a path that will forever change their lives.This is a The Color Alchemist short novel that is exclusive to the author's newsletter subscribers.
author: Nina Walker
